duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide customer support and troubleshooting for HCM software through multi-channel interactions.
Act as a front-line triage to address urgent and less complex issues, and educate customers on system procedures.
Monitor system performance, identify and resolve issues, and escalate complex cases as needed.
Document and manage customer cases, prioritize tasks, and update scheduled payroll dates.
Attend internal meetings and huddles as scheduled.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree preferred or 4 years equitable business experience required
